sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Focus shifts to Hunters: Haeight, Seraphel du Marquin, the Afiele tragedy, Guild bureaucracy. Nyx joins Huntsong's tour.

sections.title: Afiele Tragedy
sections.content: Lord Lantal & Risel Afiele slain in necromancer ambush; children Culin & Sasi survive. Seraphel escapes as well.

sections.title: Crypt Accident
sections.content: Ikhoven mistakenly gives Haeight a veteran-level mission. Her team confronts skeleton knight, flees into crypt. They fight for hours until veterans arrive with Piortesenzth.

sections.title: Hunters & Veterans
sections.content: Haeight’s trauma from crypt. Agshiga, Delifec, Ikhoven loom large. Piortesenzth emerges as terrifying weapon against undead.

sections.title: Nyx Threads
sections.content: Nyx struggles with provisional status. Builds ties with Sera & Haeight. Faces surprise 'Darryn' encounters meant to test her resolve.
